document.webtitle: Have you ever threw a drink on someone or had a drink thrown on you? - Yahoo! Answers
document.description: ... some teens just passing buy and threw Slurpee's or just some drink from a fast food restaurant. ... is your favorite type of food? What is your favorite type of car?

What are you looking for? Advanced Search Home > All Categories > Entertainment&Music > Polls&Surveys > Resolved Question ☆That's what she said ☆ Member since: March 15, 2007 Total points: 7,204 (Level 5) Add Contact Block
Resolved Question Show me another » Have you ever threw a drink on someone or had a drink thrown on you? what for 3 years ago Report Abuse by Lifer Member since: August 12, 2008 Total points: 2,573 (Level 4) Add Contact Block
Best Answer - Chosen by Asker Yeah, I threw a cup of water on my wife. Shes done it to like a million time when she was mad. Her face was priceless though. 3 years ago Report Abuse
4 people rated this as good Asker's Rating: Asker's Comment: lol Action Bar: 3 stars - mark this as Interesting! Email Comment ( 0 ) Save Add to My Yahoo! Add to Del.icio.us RSS
There are currently no comments for this question.
* You must be logged into Answers to add comments. Sign in or Register .
Other Answers (25) Show: All Answers Oldest to Newest Newest to Oldest Rated Highest to Lowest by Maty M Member since: December 13, 2006 Total points: 1,092 (Level 3) Add Contact Block I have never thrown a drink at anyone before but I have had people throw stuff at me for no reason. It has happened four times. The first time was in Mexico. A buss was passing by and I was waiting for it to pass so that I can cross the street and someone threw out a bottle of coke at me and hit me right cheek bone. I had a black eye for the whole summer I was 9 years old. Then the other times was out here in Southern Cali while I was walking to either school or the store. Again no reason some teens just passing buy and threw Slurpee's or just some drink from a fast food restaurant. 3 years ago Report Abuse
2 people rated this as good by Ryan M Member since: March 05, 2009 Total points: 269 (Level 2) Add Contact Block I did today to my 14 year old brother.
We had left home so I could take him to baseball practice at 6. so we left at 5:45 and went to the gas station to get something to drink. So he got a cherry icee. he drank 3/4 of it and then we got to where his practice was. As he was getting his stuff I was like please take your trash out of my car and he's like no. Then I repeated myself and he's like my hands are full. So I told him to take it again because I had just cleaned my car out today and I didn't want his trash in there and he was being hella dick about it. Then he slammed the door so I rolled down the window and threw it at him.
=) 3 years ago Report Abuse
2 people rated this as good by CrazyGre... Member since: January 15, 2009 Total points: 2,631 (Level 4) Add Contact Block Yes I have. It's the most effective way to get a Man to realize the answer is NO for the final time when he is torturing You in a bar and then proceeds to touch You anywhere on Your body and You don't want to be touched by him anywhere! 3 years ago Report Abuse
1 person rated this as good by Mr. Bitter Member since: May 04, 2008 Total points: 16,520 (Level 6) Add Contact Block I threw a glass of orange juice in my brother's face one morning.
I don't remember why.. I was only 13.
Never had one thrown at me... well, not exactly.
Once, back in the 80's.. I took an empty beer can to the face during the"Rocky Horror Picture Show.".
Does that count? 3 years ago Report Abuse
1 person rated this as good by dcarpent... Member since: December 09, 2007 Total points: 13,765 (Level 6) Add Contact Block Yes my friend and I was in Mazatlan, Mexico using a pay phone to call his wife. When a man threw a pint of beer at us. We immediately spotted an officer and reported the crime. The man was caught 5 minutes later. 3 years ago Report Abuse
2 people rated this as good by Madisons Mommy =) Member since: March 14, 2007 Total points: 12,313 (Level 6) Add Contact Block Somone accidentally spilled a drink on me at a croweded party...it happens to be my best friends ex...I turned around and spilled my drink entirely on him...=) 3 years ago Report Abuse
2 people rated this as good by Buster Member since: May 29, 2008 Total points: 866 (Level 2) Add Contact Block Not on purpose. I have had a couple of drinks spilled on me by accident. I feel sorry for the person dumb enough to throw their drink on me if it ever happens. 3 years ago Report Abuse
1 person rated this as good by Capt Blackie Member since: July 29, 2007 Total points: 7,832 (Level 5) Add Contact Block No I usually use my fists or some sort of effective weapon rather than wasting good booze but I've had drinks thrown on me a few times. For various perceived slights and insults, invariably at the hands of a woman. 3 years ago Report Abuse
1 person rated this as good by ♥To The Only Thing Thats True♥ Member since: August 25, 2008 Total points: 7,847 (Level 5) Add Contact Block In 6th grade this girl threw her gatorade on me, because I didn't pass her the basketball in PE one time. Source(s): Ridiculous. 3 years ago Report Abuse
2 people rated this as good by ? Member since: April 10, 2009 Total points: 350 (Level 2) Add Contact Block I have threatened with a Glass Bottle to my brother but I have thrown a plastic bottle full of ice at my friend 3 years ago Report Abuse
1 person rated this as good by cant_fig... Member since: March 23, 2009 Total points: 2,497 (Level 3) Add Contact Block yup, i thew water at my little brother once cause i wanted to know what it's like, he agreed anyways. hahaha we are weird. :P 3 years ago Report Abuse
1 person rated this as good by MIA Member since: December 28, 2007 Total points: 5,539 (Level 5) Add Contact Block I threw my drink on my best friend because she was freaking out over nothing.
I warned her that I was going to if she didn't chill the fcck out. She didn't believe me. :D 3 years ago Report Abuse
1 person rated this as good by ♥Proud Momma of 3 in TN♥ Member since: June 05, 2008 Total points: 3,182 (Level 4) Add Contact Block i threw a glass of milk on my hubby once lol. he threw a glass of water back on me. 3 years ago Report Abuse
1 person rated this as good by Frenchie Member since: December 19, 2007 Total points: 6,176 (Level 5) Add Contact Block I threw a drink on this douche at a club that called me a B*tch 3 years ago Report Abuse

Member since: May 17, 2006 Total points: 18,056 (Level 6) Add Contact Block One time this drunk guy spilled his beer down my back while we were dancing. :/ lol 3 years ago Report Abuse

Member since: November 20, 2008 Total points: 2,370 (Level 3) Add Contact Block every time i go to a concert i get beer dumped on me... does that count? lol 3 years ago Report Abuse

i wuz pissed off
xD 3 years ago Report Abuse
